Player History

Earned first career win on 6/24/2024...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/8/2024, off Robert Gonzalez (SLB)...
Traded from Kansas City to Houston on 4/6/2026 (Going to KC: LF Arthur Lantigua, C Stuart Duckworth, P Bennie Ratley. Going to HOU: C Israel Gonsalves, P Benito Medina, SS Eric Witherspoon)...
1/31/2028: Gets a new one-year contract worth $784,286 through salary arbitration...
